code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U1 as User A (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
    participant U2 as User B (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
    participant SC as Smart Contracts
    participant R as Relayer
    participant CA as Chain A (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    participant CB as Chain B (HealthTech_PatientRecords)

    U1->>SC: 1. Create Swap
    SC->>CA: E1: Deploy Source Escrow
    CA->>CA: State: User Funds Locked (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
    
    U2->>SC: 2. Fulfill Swap
    SC->>CB: E2: Deploy Destination Escrow
    CB->>CB: State: Fulfiller Funds Locked (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    
    R->>SC: 3. Set Fulfiller
    SC->>CA: State: Fulfiller Set
    
    U1->>R: 4. Submit Secret
    R->>CA: E3: Secret Revealed
    CA->>CA: State: Unlock with Secret
    R->>CB: E3: Secret Revealed
    CB->>CB: State: Unlock with Secret
    
    CA->>U1: 5. User A Gets Tokens
    CB->>U2: 5. User B Gets Tokens
    
    Note over CA,CB: Swap Completed Successfully

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords 的环节。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理 才对。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 的逻辑。
